quotes.quote: A good lawyer never give up, until he wants to, or until he gets what he wants.
Lawyers are: By law's dark by ways he has stored his mind with wicked knowledge on how to cheat mankind.
A jury consists of twelve persons chosen to decide who has the better lawyer.
The leading rule for the lawyer, as for the man of every calling, is diligence.
Lawyers are like rhinoceroses: thick skinned, short-sighted, and always ready to charge.
Lawyers are: One skilled in the circumvention of the law.
The main business of a lawyer is to take the romance, the mystery, the irony, the ambiguity out of everything he touches.
He is no lawyer who cannot take two sides.
Lawyers are merchants of misery.
Laws should be like clothes. They should be made to fit the people they serve.
Where there is a rift in the lute, the business of the lawyer is to widen the rift and gather the loot.
A lawyer is a person who writes a 10,000-word document and calls it a brief.
A very clever lawyer can create a lot of damage, we can only hope that lawyers never figure out how to manipulate physical law.
Divorce lawyers stoke anger and fear in their clients, knowing that as long as the conflicts remain unresolved the revenue stream will keep flowing.
The power of the lawyer is in the uncertainty of the law.
It is not what a lawyer tells me I may do; but what humanity, reason, and justice tell me I ought to do.
Arguing with a lawyer is not the hardest thing in the world; not arguing is.
I'm a lawyer. I go for due process; I go for fairness and equity these values mean a lot to me.
There is never a deed so foul that something couldn't be said for the guy; that's why there are lawyers.
A lawyer is a gentleman that rescues your estate from your enemies and then keeps it to himself.
Lawyers are: One who defends you at the risk of your pocketbook, reputation and life.
A lawyer without books would be like a workman without tools.
Miracles of Heaven: to believe lawyers.
How lawyers make work for one another! You're all priests, worshipping the same god. No wonder you adore one another.
Lawyers were notorious for finding cases in the most unlikely places, especially ones with huge potential damagers awards.
Make crime pay. Become a lawyer.
As a lawyer who has dealt in defamation, I know that someone's reputation has to be lowered in the eyes of right-thinking people to sue.
Lawyers are the only persons in whom ignorance of the law is not punished.
A lawyer will do anything to win a case, sometimes he will even tell the truth.
A good lawyer is a bad Christian.
